thread.title: What's Happening With These REIT Stocks? -- DDR Corp., GGP Inc., Kimco Realty, and Weingarten Realty Investors

author: cnbc.com
title: What's Happening With These REIT Stocks? -- DDR Corp., GGP Inc., Kimco Realty, and Weingarten Realty Investors
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on DDR, GGP, KIM, and WRI which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . This morning, WallStEquities.com revisits the Retail REIT space, which owns and manages retail real estate, and rent space in those properties to tenants. Four stocks have been lined up for assessment today, and they are: DDR Corp. (NYSE: DDR), GGP Inc. (NYSE: GGP), Kimco Realty Corp. (NYSE: KIM), and Weingarten Realty Investors (NYSE: WRI). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
DDR Corp.
DDR Corp.'s shares finished Friday's session 2.07% lower at $7.09. A total volume of 14.61 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 4.72 million shares. The stock is trading below its 50-day moving average by 14.09%. Moreover, shares of DDR Corp., which owns a high-quality portfolio of open-air shopping centers in major metropolitan areas that provide a highly-compelling shopping experience and merchandise mix for retail partners and consumers, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 24.68.
On January 16 th , 2018, DDR Corp. announced that its financial and operational results for the quarter ending December 31 st , 2017, will be released following the market close on February 15 th , 2018. The Company will host its quarterly earnings conference call and audio webcast at 4:45 p.m. ET that same day. The call will be webcast and available in "listen-only" mode on the Company's website. Get the full research report on DDR for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=DDR
GGP Inc.
Shares in GGP Inc. ended the day 2.73% higher at $22.21. A total volume of 9.13 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 6.66 shares. The stock has advanced 2.07% in the previous three months. The Company's shares are trading 0.92% below their 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares GGP, which focuses exclusively on owning, managing, leasing and redeveloping high-quality retail properties throughout the US, have an RSI of 41.46.
On February 02 nd , 2018, research firm Sandler O'Neill downgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Hold' to 'Sell'.
On February 07 th , 2018, GGP Inc.'s Board of Directors declared a Q1 common stock dividend of $0.22 per share, payable on April 30 th , 2018, to stockholders of record on April 13 th , 2018. The Board also declared a quarterly dividend on the Company's 6.375% Series A Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Stock of $0.3984 per share, payable on April 02 nd , 2018 to stockholders of record on March 15 th , 2018. Today's complimentary research report on GGP is accessible at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=GGP
Kimco Realty
New Hyde Park headquartered Kimco Realty Corp.'s stock rose 1.21%, closing the session at $14.18. A total volume of 11.25 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 4.87 million shares. The Company's shares are trading 17.79% below their 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Kimco Realty have an RSI of 20.14.
On January 31 st , 2018, Kimco Realty announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.28 per common share, payable on April 16 th , 2018, to shareholders of record on April 03 rd , 2018. The Board also declared quarterly dividends for the Company's preferred shares (Class I depositary shares; Class J depositary shares; Class K depositary shares; Class L depositary shares; and Class M depositary shares), payable on April 16 th , 2018, to shareholders of record on April 02 nd , 2018. Register now for your free research document on KIM at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=KIM
Weingarten Realty Investors
On Friday, shares in Weingarten Realty Investors finished the session 1.51% higher at $26.88. A total volume of 850,703 shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 711,370 shares. The stock is trading below its 200-day moving average by 13.40%. Moreover, shares of the Company, which engages in providing leasing space to tenants in the shopping centers that it owns or leases, have an RSI of 25.50.
On January 16 th , 2018, Weingarten Realty Investors (WRI) released the Federal income tax treatment of the Company's 2017 distributions to holders of its Common Shares of Beneficial Interest. The company urged its shareholders to consult with their personal tax advisors as to their specific tax treatment of the Company's cash distributions, while also advising them to contact WRI's Investor Relations Department for additional information.
On January 22 nd , 2018, research firm SunTrust upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Hold' to 'Buy'. Click on the link below and see our free report WRI at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=WRI
--
